posts.post_title: C46 Imperial Tobacco Lot of 5 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Lot of 5 cards. Very nice exish condition. No creases or wrinkles. Please pm or email if interested. SOLD delivered.

#50 Doescher, Jersey City
#66 Hughes, Rochester
#78 Hardy, Montreal
#79 Holmes, Newark
#89 McCarty, Newark
